issue.title: Add a README with some basic info including installation/setup
issue.body:
Came here from the TCon Hackathon info page via their Twitter. I love this project and concept, and gave it a quick spin; but it's not runnable without adjusting connect.js. So here's a basic (stubby) README that should help people get started :)

Also, I added a little "License" block. It's up to you what license you pick, but I would recommend being explicit - either "all rights reserved" (which means nobody's allowed to use this in any way) or one of the popular open source licenses, eg MIT.

issue.title: Chat/emotes are not shown, only livestream
Chat/emotes are not shown, only livestream
